name: NeverHaveIEver
0:
”Alexa, open never have I ever”
”Alexa, play never have I ever”
”Alexa, launch never have I ever and ask me a question”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: never have i ever
des:
Over 100 Never Have I Ever questions. The game can be played as a drinking game or with friends to get to know them better. This version is suited for all ages. A fun entertaining game to be played with multiple people. 

To play as a drinking game* Participants must sit in a circle, each with a drink. Players go around the circle and ask Alexa for a question("Alexa, play Never Have I Ever"), all players that have undertaken that task must take a sip of their drink. One by one each player asks Alexa. 

Some variations of the game, all players must put up their 10 fingers. Every time they drink, they put done one finger. The game ends when someone has all fingers down.

To use simply ask:
"Alexa, open Never Have I Ever"
"Alexa, play Never Have I Ever"
"Alexa, open Never Have I Ever and tell me a question"

If you'd like to add any questions, hit me up:
http://twitter.com/VikingSkullApps

*Remember to drink responsibly
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
